item.title: Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to join our team. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and assembling recorded raw material into a finished product that matches our company's vision and style. You will work closely with our creative team to ensure the final product is of high quality and meets the client's requirements.

Requirements:
- Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar
- Strong understanding of visual storytelling and video composition
- Ability to work under tight deadlines and deliver high-quality results
- Attention to detail and excellent organizational skills
- Experience with color correction, audio mixing, and motion graphics is a plus

This is a medium-sized project that will last between 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate level video editor who can bring creativity and professionalism to our projects.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 02:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Exteramly Urugent: Create iPad Shortcuts for Video Tutorial Navigation - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking an experienced freelancer to create an  iPad shortcut to help organize and navigate instructional videos for my father. The shortcuts will be used to play instructional videos about a subject that I have created. The goal is to make it as simple as possible for an elderly person to watch and navigate the videos using his iPad.
Project Details:
Shortcuts Features:
1. Home Shortcut: Display three main options: How to Make Pancakes, How to Make a Pizza, How to Make Cheesecake.
2. Playlist Shortcuts: Each option (e.g., How to Make Pancakes) will link to a series of steps with corresponding video files. When a playlist is selected, (e.g., How to Make Pancakes) it should have three buttons: Repeat Step, Previous Step, Next Step.
3. Video Management: Allow for easy addition and deletion of videos in each playlist.
4. User Experience: Simple and intuitive interface suitable for an elderly user with limited technical skills. Ensure the shortcuts are accessible and easy to navigate.
Deliverables:
• A link to the created shortcuts that I can easily install on my iPad.
• Instructions on how to organize and rename the video files for the shortcuts to work correctly on my iPad.
• An explainer video on how to manage the videos.
Skills Required:
• Proficiency in creating and designing iOS/iPadOS shortcuts.
• Experience with video playback and playlist management in shortcuts.
• Familiarity with the Shortcuts app on iOS.
To Apply: Provide a brief and to the point explanation stating you can get it done and the color blue so that I know you have read the post. It is extremely urgent.


Hourly Range: $11.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 02:18 UTC
Category: Development & IT Project Management
Skills:Computing & Networking, iOS, Education, Explainer Video, Task Automation, Automation, Video Production
Skills: Computing & Networking, iOS, Education, Explainer Video, Task Automation, Automation, Video Production
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Content Creator & Editor | AI-Generated Content - Upwork
item.description:
**Job Overview:**

We are seeking a talented and innovative Content Creator & Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will be proficient in leveraging AI technology to create and edit high-quality content for various social media platforms. This role involves creating engaging, original content as directed, and ensuring it aligns with our brand voice and objectives.

**Responsibilities:**

- Utilize AI tools to generate creative and engaging content for social media.
- Edit and refine AI-generated content to meet quality standards and brand guidelines.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to understand content requirements and objectives.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in AI content creation and social media marketing.
- Ensure all content is accurate, well-written, and adheres to our company’s tone and style.
- Manage multiple projects and deliver high-quality work within deadlines.

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience as a content creator or editor, preferably with experience in AI-generated content.
- Proficiency in using AI tools and technologies for content creation (e.g., OpenAI GPT, Jasper, etc.).
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and their content requirements.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Strong attention to detail and a creative mindset.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Previous experience working in a remote or freelance setting.
- Familiarity with graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite) is a plus.

**Why Join Us:**

- Work with a dynamic and innovative team.
- Flexible working hours and remote work environment.
- Opportunity to work on exciting projects and grow your skills in AI content creation.

If you are passionate about creating cutting-edge content and have the skills to transform AI-generated material into compelling social media posts, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and become a part of our creative team!

---

**How to Apply:**

Please submit your resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio of your previous work, including examples of AI-generated content you have created or edited.

SHortlisted Candidates will be presented with clear documentation about the role and have the opportunity to book a meeting with us to discuss.


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 16, 2024 02:01 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Image Editing, Video Editing, Content Creation, AI Content Creation
Skills: Image Editing, Video Editing, Content Creation, AI Content Creation
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Brand Social Media Guidelines Designer - Upwork
item.description:
I run a marketing agency.

We are looking for a talented designer who can understand a brand's personality, messaging, style, etc. and develop a comprehensive mood board for our designers and video editors.

Here's how it will work:
- I will send you some designs and inspirations for a brand
- I will send you some negative examples
- Come up with social media guidelines and a mood board that designers and video editors can use

The mood board will serve as a guide for creating social media content that aligns with our brands' identities. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of branding principles and be able to translate them into visual elements.

Responsibilities:
- Understand brand's personality, messaging, style, etc.
- Develop a moodboard that effectively communicates the brand's visual identity
- Review content from designers and video editors to ensure the moodboard is followed in the creation of social media content

Requirements:
- Strong understanding of branding principles
- Excellent visual design skills
- Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite
- Ability to work collaboratively and meet deadlines

Hourly Range: $24.00-$48.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 01:56 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Brand Guidelines, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Imagery
Skills: Graphic Design, Brand Guidelines, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Imagery
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: User generated content - Video products sold on Amazon - Upwork
item.description:
User Generated Content In The Raw

Description
I am looking for footage of items that are sold on Amazon. Here are the details:

Requirements:

Scan Products:

Use the Amazon app to scan items you own in your house.
Send me a list of the items.

Video Specifications:

Film using your phone.
Mostly horizontal video footage is required.
Include some short clips in upright (vertical) view.
Hold the phone steady while filming.
Sound quality is not important as it will be removed during editing.

Content:

Only film the product, avoiding other products or branding in the video.
Show the product working or its features.
Clips should be short; I will piece them together.

Examples:
Nespresso Coffee Machine:

Film where the water is filled.
Film loading a pod.
Film making a coffee.
Film frothing the milk.
Film pouring the coffee (both horizontal and vertical views).
Office Chair:

Film all around the chair.
Do a close-up of the upholstery and the wheels.
Push the chair to show it moving.
Show how to adjust the chair.
Show someone sitting on it (no faces required).

Payment:
For 1-2 minutes of footage, payment is based on the value of the product:

Products valued under $20 = $5
Products from $20 to $50 = $10
Products from $50 to $100 = $15
Products over $100 to $200 = $20
Products over $200 in value = $30

How to Apply:
Anyone can apply if you have products from Amazon.  



Approval:
After scanning products and providing a list.
I will let you know which items qualify.



Benefits:

Earning Potential:

Imagine filming 5 products over $200 in value, taking you 10-20 minutes, and getting paid $150. That's how easy it is.

No editing or worrying what to say.

Let's get started! Scan a few things in your house with the amazon app by clicking in the search bar at the top and then press scan. Point the phone at the product. Get ready to earn some easy money!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 16, 2024 01:45 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:M4V, MP4, UGC, Unboxing Video, Video Production
Skills: M4V, MP4, UGC, Unboxing Video, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Video Editor and Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a talented Podcast Editor and Content Creator to join our dynamic content creation agency. If you have a passion for transforming raw recordings into polished, professional podcasts and creating engaging social media content, we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities:

Podcast Editing:

Edit recordings from Riverside to create a high-quality podcast similar to Jordan Peterson's style.
Switch between speakers based on who is talking and occasionally show both speakers.
Remove dead spots (moments of silence) and filler words (e.g., uhh, um, you know, like).
Ensure all participants sound clear, intelligent, and professional.

Clip Creation:

Identify and select 3-5 engaging segments from each podcast episode.
Choose clips that represent the best parts of the conversation.
Follow provided guidelines to select impactful segments.

Trailer Production:

Create a compelling trailer for each podcast episode.
We have a format we can use but ideally we will come up with something better together.

Requirements:

Proven experience in podcast editing.
Strong attention to detail and ability to maintain high audio quality standards.
Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively.
Creativity in identifying engaging podcast segments and creating captivating trailers.
Familiarity with Riverside or similar recording platforms is a plus.


Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 01:32 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Podcast, Sound Mixing, Video Editing
Skills: Podcast, Sound Mixing, Video Editing
Country: CAN
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Fitness Influencer Style Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a skilled video editor who specializes in editing fitness influencer style videos for Instagram and TikTok. The ideal candidate should have plenty of experience in this niche and be able to deliver high-quality, engaging content that aligns with our brand. This is a great opportunity to collaborate with a growing fitness brand and gain exposure in the industry.

    Responsibilities:
    - Edit fitness influencer style videos for Instagram and TikTok
    - Enhance video quality and add relevant effects
    - Ensure smooth transitions and engaging storytelling
    - Implement music and sound effects to enhance the overall experience

    Requirements:
    - Proven experience in editing fitness influencer style videos
    - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
    - Strong understanding of current trends and styles on Instagram and TikTok

    If you're passionate about fitness and have a knack for creating visually appealing content, we would love to have you on our team. Please provide your portfolio or samples of relevant work when applying.

item.title: Audio and Video Ad Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual who can create a mix of Spotify audio ads and video ads. The ideal candidate should have experience in recording radio ads and using existing content to create custom video ads. The main responsibilities of this role include conceptualizing and producing engaging audio and visual content, ensuring that it aligns with our brand guidelines and target audience. The successful candidate should also have excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with our marketing team. If you are a creative thinker with a passion for storytelling through audio and video, we would love to hear from you!

- Audio production
- Video editing
- Copywriting
- Creative thinking
- Branding

- Communication

item.title: CapCut Video Editor for Facebook/Instagram Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented CapCut video editor to join our team on a daily basis. If you have a passion for creating engaging and high-quality video content and are available to work quickly, this opportunity is for you!

Responsibilities:

Edit videos using CapCut based on provided scripts, ideas, and concepts.
Create auto captions for videos.
Perform UGC (User-Generated Content) mashups.
Utilize greenscreens effectively in videos.
Ensure videos meet deadlines and maintain high attention to detail.
Requirements:

Proficiency in CapCut editing software.
Experience with creating auto captions.
Ability to produce UGC mashups.
Skilled in using greenscreens for video editing.
Strong attention to detail and ability to meet tight deadlines.
Experience in creating Facebook and Instagram ads is a plus.
Preferred Skills:

Creativity in video editing and storytelling.
Excellent communication skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills we are looking for, we would love to hear from you! Please include examples of your previous work with your application.

How to Apply:

**Provide your portfolio or links to previous work.**
Briefly describe your experience with CapCut and relevant video editing projects.
Mention your availability and preferred working hours.
Join us in creating captivating and impactful video ads that engage audiences on Facebook and Instagram!



Hourly Range: $3.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 01:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing
Country: United States
